ai-tha-ap323:1.3_0: It is entering immersion with remaining in it.
ai-tha-ap323:3.1_0: A corrupt maidens means it stands on the charnel ground.
ai-tha-ap323:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap323:4.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap323:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap323:5.1_0: it’s because of the five constituents
ai-tha-ap323:5.2_0: I was the one great hermit.
ai-tha-ap323:6.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap323:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Uppalavaṇṇā.
